welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tan Uyen, Vietnam! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich culture, beautiful landscapes, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Tan Uyen has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Tan Son Nhat International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer international terminal at Tan Son Nhat International Airport, primarily used by Vietnam Airlines.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Tan Son Nhat International Airport, serving flights within Vietnam.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.
